name: Robo-Power
description:
You've been sent to restore power to a town that has been without power for days!

Program your robots to navigate obstacles and carry power blocks to the power deposit platform. Otherwise, you'll have to contend with the town's ornery mayor...

Originally created for the 39th Ludum Dare 48 Hour Jam, with the theme: Running Out of Power.

Vote here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/robo-power
